text: Here are 3 reasons in under 60 seconds why you need to subscribe to SORTEDFood!
Number 1- Do you like to eat?
Of course you do! Which is why we take inspiration from across the world
AND with your tips and tricks, recreate the best possible versions of that dish.
That way, you can cook them at home!
Number 2- Do you like to have a laugh?
Of course you do! We've been mates for years and SORTEDFood is just about about getting into the kitchen
cooking up some great grub, and just enjoying yourself.
Finally, Number 3- YOU are in control!
SORTED is all about our community; you guys tell us what to cook and where to find the best food around!
And who knows where that could take us?!?
